name: Mojingo
overview: Mojingo is a social media sports advisory website which taps the wealth of sports knowledge from millions of sports fans across the country. Itâ€™s a place for interaction between those who know sports best and those who need to get more information. If you bet on sports you need Mojingo. If you chatter about sports you want Mojingo. If you like sports, youâ€™ll love Mojingo! Mojingo was created by two fans looking to enjoy sports gambling but were frustrated by the lack of a single organized site that provided all of the information needed to make an informed sports bet. At Mojingo, you can share sports knowledge, research games, and compete in fantasy pick â€˜em contests for cash prizes in the 6 major sports. Mojingo is a website that delivers many unique features and tons of information in one organized place, helping the user to make the most educated and informed bet. Mojingo is not a gambling site, as users participate in all contests for FREE! Mojingo gives you, the sports fan, a place to show how much you know about sports. Make picks against real betting lines in the 6 major sports, with help from statistics and other information provided on the site. The â€œMy Picksâ€ page is an exciting place for you to track your progress on every game picked, as results update live! Contest standings update in real-time to show where you stack up. Brag about your knowledge to friends and other users, and if you really know what youâ€™re doing, you bring home the cash prize! With hundreds of teams playing thousands of games, it can be difficult to make the smart play. Mojingo offers you the tools to research games, such as team comparisons, complete with recent betting trends and team statistics. Get real-time odds and stay on top of the latest injuries. Mojingo tracks every userâ€™s wins and losses by sport, league, division and team, leading you to the experts. Use their knowledge and pregame predictions to your benefit.
